name: lf
description: Pushes a line feed to the stack. Useful for printing.

name: cr
description: Pushes a carriage return to the stack.

name: dq
description: Pushes a double-quote (") to the stack. This is the only way to create a string containing this character as they are normally used to delineate strings.

name: IsEditMode
description: Returns a bool indicating if the game is running in edit mode.
